entry.title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 12 - The Sunset Years of David's Life

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 12 - The Sunset Years of David's Life
media:group.media:description:
David was a man after God's own heart. This message is about the last 10 years of his reign.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. Few Old Testament characters have had as much impact on the modern Christian faith as David, the beloved shepherd-king of Israel. And today, his story—the challenges, the adventures, and the highs and lows—still has amazing power to inform and transform our walk with God.

entry.title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 11 - Absalom

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 11 - Absalom
media:group.media:description:
All of us either surrender to God like David or we rebel like Absalom. We either do our own thing or we worship God as King. Jesus laid down His life to show His love for you.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. Few Old Testament characters have had as much impact on the modern Christian faith as David, the beloved shepherd-king of Israel. And today, his story—the challenges, the adventures, and the highs and lows—still has amazing power to inform and transform our walk with God.

entry.title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 10 - David's Great Sin

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 10 - David's Great Sin
media:group.media:description:
After a painful lesson, David realized the extent of his sin with Bathsheba and came to the point of repentance. We can learn much from this story about true repentance and God's forgiveness.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. Few Old Testament characters have had as much impact on the modern Christian faith as David, the beloved shepherd-king of Israel. And today, his story—the challenges, the adventures, and the highs and lows—still has amazing power to inform and transform our walk with God.

entry.title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 9 - Mighty & Merciful

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 9 - Mighty & Merciful
media:group.media:description:
David was a mighty king. There is no mention in the Bible of him losing any battle. In the same way if you have Jesus as your General you have nothing to fear.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. Few Old Testament characters have had as much impact on the modern Christian faith as David, the beloved shepherd-king of Israel. And today, his story—the challenges, the adventures, and the highs and lows—still has amazing power to inform and transform our walk with God.

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 8 - Securing the Kingdom
media:group.media:description:
David was a great king who was a type of Jesus the King of kings.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. entry.title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 7 - From Carmel to Ziklag

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 7 - From Carmel to Ziklag
media:group.media:description:
The story of David and his soldiers fighting for and saving their families represents how God is going to save us from the devil.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. entry.title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 6 - Nabal & Abigail

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 6 - Nabal & Abigail
media:group.media:description:
The story of Nabal and Abigail is an example of how Jesus is our mediator and that God blesses us so we can be a blessing to others.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. media:group.media:description: What parallels exist between the old and new covenants? What role does the law play in the covenant?

entry.title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 5 - Vengeance & Mercy

media:group.media:title: "The Shepherd King" Revival Series Part 5 - Vengeance & Mercy
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever had an opportunity to get even with someone that hurt you? Maybe God's giving you that opportunity to get even with your enemies so you don't take that opportunity, and you can demonstrate what it means to be a Christian and you overcome evil with good.
"The Shepherd King" is a 12-part revival series with Pastor @Doug Batchelor first aired in Spring of 2017. Few Old Testament characters have had as much impact on the modern Christian faith as David, the beloved shepherd-king of Israel. And today, his story—the challenges, the adventures, and the highs and lows—still has amazing power to inform and transform our walk with God.
